https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/cAld4WLIUOP2rxt79UlDqhS9HlM.jpg Going beyond the occasional news clip from Burma, the acclaimed filmmaker, Anders Ã˜stergaard, brings us close to the video journalists who deliver the footage. Though risking torture and life in jail, courageous young citizens of Burma live the essence of journalism as they insist on keeping up the flow of news from their closed country. Burma VJ: Reporting from a Closed Country
